resources.string: Click on the ? for mor details

To this awesome App!

 You're on the right way to safely keep your most important things (the access data to all of your accounts) right next to you in your pocket.

 This App lets you do this in a nice and easy way. I (the developer) hope you enjoy this app the little time you going to use it.

 In the next step you have to setup your master password so don't wait and hit "setup"ðŸ‘‡
To get help by choosing the right values click the ?-button
If you don\'t enter a PIM it will keep the calculated.
In this view you can see your password and the correlating PIM. You can keep the PIM or change it, but be careful!
To get help by choosing the right password click the ?-button
